pullRequest.title: Handle 404 responses from get aggregate API
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Support custom response handlers in the rest api client so that the get aggregate API can handle 404s without suppressing them from other endpoints where they may indicate a misconfiguration of a reverse proxy etc.
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message: Support custom response handlers in the rest api client

nodes.bodyText: i would have thought putting in SC_NOT_FOUND here as noValueHandler would have been adequate? it'll be a common use case potentially...
